Ukraine military destroys Russian surveillance plane - air force commanderUkraine's military on Friday destroyed a Russian A-50 surveillance aircraft, Air Force Commander Mykola Oleshchuk said, the second time in a little more than a month that Ukraine has reported downing the sophisticated plane. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 19:37:18 GMT CUVYCVKPGRMURI4OA4PROEWMCY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-military-destroys- Russian-surveillance-plane-air-force-commander-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Church of England mulls asylum seeker change amid conversion rowThe Church of England (CoE) is considering updating its guidance to clergy on supporting and ministering to asylum seekers, amid concerns that religious conversions are being exploited by people seeking to stay in Britain. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:50:35 GMT LDTKBGKYSVK5DEKOFYKBIIHN64 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/church-england-muls-asylum-seeker-change-amid-conversion-row-2024-02-23/Muvija M世界英国
Ukraine supporters lay path to try to force US House vote on aid billU.S. House of Representatives Democrats have begun laying the groundwork for a potential bid to sidestep Republican Speaker Mike Johnson and force a vote on a $95 billion security assistance package for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan, House aides said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:39:46 GMT V3K37JX4NVIIBONXTYWYQU4CGU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ukraine-supporters-lay-path-try-force-us-house-vote-aid-bill-2024-02-23/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
EU agriculture commissioner proposes policy shift as farmers protestThe EU should change conditions imposed on farmers to benefit from Common Agriculture Policy (CAP) funding, European Agriculture Commissioner Janusz Wojciechowski said in an interview with French newspapers of the Ebra group. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:26:10 GMT BOEVHU5NQJOM5DJ67O732JNOBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-agriculture-commissioner-proposes-policy-shift-farmers-protest-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Valencia fire: What we know about Spain's apartment block blazeA fire that swept through an apartment complex in the Spanish city of Valencia, killing at least 10 people, has prompted comparisons with London's 2017 Grenfell Tower inferno and raised concerns about fire safety standards and cladding materials. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:18:41 GMT UANYZ4AF6BJJLIQRASEMZXQAVY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/valencia-fire-what-we-know-spain-apartment-block-blaze-2024-02-23/Emma Pinedo世界欧洲
Vienna court finds Austrian ex-Chancellor Kurz guilty of perjuryA Vienna court on Friday found Austria's conservative former Chancellor Sebastian Kurz guilty of perjury and handed him an eight-month suspended jail sentence, dealing a serious blow to any chance he may have of launching a political comeback. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:17:32 GMT 7UGRSOUL3BOC7L2RGZYS43GJLY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/vienna-court-finds-austrian-ex-chancellor-kurz-guilty-of-perjury-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Senegalese President Sall's opposition rivals reject talksSenegalese opposition presidential candidates on Friday rejected an invitation to join talks that President Macky Sall says are necessary before a delayed presidential election can be scheduled. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:14:34 GMT QEF6OYQWTJMQTIUZIB62UIDRKA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegalese-president-salls-opposition-rivals-reject-talks-2024-02-23/Reuters世界非洲
Ecuador calls off arms exchange with US over plan to send weapons to UkraineEcuador's government has canceled a plan to trade outdated Soviet weapons for new arms from the United States, President Daniel Noboa said, after learning the old weapons would have been sent to Ukraine. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 18:07:28 GMT LCZGQINTHRPRFC2MANTTW5NOJE https://www.reuters.com/world/ecuador-calls-off-arms-exchange-with-us-over-plan-to-send-weapons-to-ukraine-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
US, China officials discuss Russia-North Korea military cooperation, State Department saysA top U.S. official on North Korea held a video call this week with China's envoy on Korean Peninsula affairs in which they discussed the growing military cooperation between Moscow and Pyongyang, the State Department said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 17:58:50 GMT VBSVNOTWPNLSDJFIEG3LLAECYI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-china-officials-discuss-Russia-north-korea-military-cooperation-state-2024-02-23/David Brunnstrom, Katharine Jackson世界
Switzerland to hold Ukraine peace conference 'by the summer'Switzerland told the United Nations on Friday that it intends to organize a high-level Ukraine peace conference "by the summer" as the 193-member world body met to mark the second anniversary of Moscow's invasion of its neighbor. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 17:42:02 GMT YTFXYZlewniedamwi2YJ7T6ACU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/switzerland-holds-ukraine-peace-conference-by-summer-2024-02-23/Michelle Nichols世界欧洲
Police beatings of pro-Palestinian schoolchildren spark outrage in ItalyFootage of police beating pro-Palestinian students drew broad condemnation in Italy on Friday, with the opposition calling for the interior minister to address parliament over the episode.
